data.text:
Uooooooo~! 
SHE. IS. WAY. TOO. COOOOOOL!!
data.name: Winning Ticket

data.text:
This is a Major race though! 
And to finish it with more than a 10 length margin?!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>This is a Major race though! 
<story>And to finish it with more than a 10 length margin?!

data.text:
I'm surprised too! To think her running 
style would have results like this…!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I'm surprised too! To think her running 
<story>style would have results like this…!

data.text:
I'm surprised too! To think her running 
style would have results like this…!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I'm surprised too! To think her running 
<story>style would have results like this…!

data.text:
It's possible, that we also have this possibility… we 
may have one-sidely accepted as impossible, things 
that are actually possible.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>It's possible, that we also have this possibility… we 
<story>may have one-sidely accepted as impossible, things 
<story>that are actually possible.

data.text:
Uoooooooo!! For some reason, I really want to run now! Do you 
think they'll allow a run-in participation for the last race!?
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Uoooooooo!! For some reason, I really want to run now! Do you 
<story>think they'll allow a run-in participation for the last race!?

data.text:
At this point that's probably impossible, 
but I know exactly how you feel.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>At this point that's probably impossible, 
<story>but I know exactly how you feel.

data.text:
Seriously… she's shown us a run that can't be called anything 
else other than a dream, hasn't she?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Seriously… she's shown us a run that can't be called anything 
<story>else other than a dream, hasn't she?

data.text: And showing us that incredible run, Silence Suzuka's [Kinko Sho]-
data.processed: <story>And showing us that incredible run, Silence Suzuka's [Kinko Sho]-

data.text:
Not only surpassed the fans' expectations, but 
the Uma Musume were also shown a dream.
data.processed:
<story>Not only surpassed the fans' expectations, but 
<story>the Uma Musume were also shown a dream.

data.text:
Who would have thought she could show 
us a race better than the last?!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed:
<story>Who would have thought she could show 
<story>us a race better than the last?!

data.text: Yeah, yeah! I wonder what kind of race she'll show us next time!
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed: <story>Yeah, yeah! I wonder what kind of race she'll show us next time!

data.text:
As I thought, Silence Suzuka is just on another 
level compared to a normal Uma Musume!
data.name: Spectator C
data.processed:
<story>As I thought, Silence Suzuka is just on another 
<story>level compared to a normal Uma Musume!

data.text:
Perhaps she is… what I have been desperately 
searching for this whole time…
data.processed:
<story>Perhaps she is… what I have been desperately 
<story>searching for this whole time…
